formulas.raw: Corrected specific gravity: $$ SG_{corr} = SG_{obs} \times \frac{\rho_w(T_{obs})}{\rho_w(T_{cal})} $$ Water density (kg/m^3) as a function of °C (Kell, 1975): $$ \rho_w(T) = 999.842594 + 6.793952\times10^{-2}T - 9.095290\times10^{-3}T^2 + 1.001685\times10^{-4}T^3 - 1.120083\times10^{-6}T^4 + 6.536332\times10^{-9}T^5 $$ Unit conversions: $$ T_{^\circ C} = (T_{^\circ F} - 32)\times\frac{5}{9} \quad ; \quad T_{^\circ F} = T_{^\circ C}\times\frac{9}{5} + 32 $$ SG ↔ Plato conversions (brewing standard approximations): $$ P \approx 135.997\,SG^3 - 630.272\,SG^2 + 1111.14\,SG - 616.868 $$ $$ SG \approx 1 + \frac{P}{258.6 - 227.1\times\left(\frac{P}{258.2}\right)} $$
